conditions/set parameters.parameters: I fight to protect those I care for!
My bow is the strongest around!
I musn't lose! I can't let them down!

skills.name: I fight to protect those I care for!
My bow is the strongest around!
I musn't lose! I can't let them down!

conditions/set parameters.parameters: Your journey ends here! I'm not letting you through!

skills.name: Your journey ends here! I'm not letting you through!

conditions/set parameters.parameters: This battlefield just isn't enough for me!
There it is! The adrenaline of the battlefield!

skills.name: This battlefield just isn't enough for me!
There it is! The adrenaline of the battlefield!

conditions/set parameters.parameters: Fool! I'm going to end you!
What are you going on about!?

skills.name: Fool! I'm going to end you!
What are you going on about!?

conditions/set parameters.parameters: Worry not, Drevas. We will not lose.
I won't forgive any who harm the God Tree.
Nngh... Drevas has begun to erode...

skills.name: Worry not, Drevas. We will not lose.
I won't forgive any who harm the God Tree.
Nngh... Drevas has begun to erode...

conditions/set parameters.parameters: I once again grant my power to ye who released me.
I wonder how many times I will come back to this world.
The curse of the Demon Pike has only just begun.

skills.name: I once again grant my power to ye who released me.
The curse of the Demon Pike has only just begun.
I wonder how many times I will come back to this world.

conditions/set parameters.parameters: It's hopeless for us at this rate!
Nngh, I feel like...I'm going to pass out...
Even after I'm gone, Drevas will still remain.
My body has become one with Drevas.

skills.name: My body has become one with Drevas.
